### `0: formatted`

```tsx
class Hello extends React.Component {
	componentDidMount() {
		const component = this.refs.hello;
	}

	render() {
		return <div>
			Hello 
			{this.props.name}
		</div>;
	}
}

```

	componentDidMount() {

### `6: formatted`

```tsx
class Hello extends React.Component {
	componentDidMount() {
		const component = this.hello;
	}

	render() {
		return <div ref={(c) => this.hello = c}>
			Hello 
			{this.props.name}
		</div>;
	}
}

```
